definition[0]: the number of times something happens, especially crime, disease etc
example[0]: Smokers had the highest incidence of colds.
example[1]: Why did the incidence of heroin use continue to climb?
definition[1]: the effect of a particular tax on people or organizations, and how much they have to pay
example[2]: The structure of production may influence the incidence of taxation.
definition[2]: the number of times something happens
example[3]: The incidence of new product failure is very high.
